text: ivarkal, tankal iraivan allahtan enru kuriyatarkaka niyayaminri tankal vitukaliliruntu etirikalal turattappattarkal. Manitarkalil (aniyayam ceyyum) cilarai, (nallavarkal) cilaraik kontu allah tatuttirukkavittal kiristavarkalin alayankalum, avarkalutaiya matankalum, yutarkalutaiya alayankalum, allahvutaiya tiruppeyar atikamaka ninaivu ceyyappatum masjitukalum alikkappatte poyirukkum. Allahvukku yar utavi ceykiraro avarukku niccayamaka allahvum utavi ceykiran. Niccayamaka allah mikap palavanum, (anaivaraiyum) mikaittavanum avan
